original_english: If you have a weakened immune system due to AIDS, cancer, transplantation, or corticosteroid use, call your doctor if you develop a cough, fever, or shortness of breath.
original_spanish: Si usted tiene un sistema inmunitario debilitado a causa del SIDA, cáncer, trasplante o uso de corticosteroides, llame al médico si presenta fiebre, tos o dificultad para respirar.
translated_spanish:
</think>

Si tienes un sistema inmunitario debilitado por el SIDA, el cáncer, la transplantation o el uso de corticosteroides, llama a tu médico si desarrollas una tos, fiebre o dificultad para respirar.<｜end▁of▁sentence｜

original_english: Do NOT place the person in this position if a head, neck, back, or leg injury is suspected or if it makes the victim uncomfortable.
original_spanish: NO coloque a la persona en esta posición si se sospecha una lesión en la cabeza, el cuello, la espalda o las piernas o si la posición le resulta incómoda.
translated_spanish:
</think>

No coloque a la persona en esta posición si se sospecha un traumatismo en la cabeza, cuello, espalda o pierna, o si esto incomoda al accidentado.<｜end▁of▁sentence｜

original_english: Increased vision allows the infant to tell objects apart from backgrounds with very little contrast (such as a button on a blouse of the same color)
original_spanish: El incremento en la visión le permite al bebé diferenciar objetos a partir de fondos con muy poco contraste (como un botón en una blusa del mismo color).

</think>

original_english: If obesity prevents you from being physically able to inspect your feet, ask a family member, neighbor, or visiting nurse to perform this important check.
original_spanish: Si la obesidad le impide físicamente poder revisarse los pies, solicítele a un familiar, un vecino o una enfermera visitadora que le realice esta importante inspección.

</think>

original_english: CT scan or MRI to confirm that there is a growth, and to see if the cancer has spread to lymph nodes in the neck
original_spanish: Tomografía computarizada o una resonancia magnética para confirmar si hay una masa y para ver si el cáncer se ha diseminado a los ganglios linfáticos en el cuello

</think>

Para confirmar la presencia de un crecimiento y verificar si el cáncer ha extendido a los ganglios linfáticos del cuello, se recomienda realizar una tomografía computarizada (TC) o una resonancia magnética nuclear (RMN).<｜end▁of▁sentence｜

original_english: A uniform brown color is usually seen over the cheeks, forehead, nose, or upper lip.It is most often symmetrical (matching on both sides of the face).
original_spanish: Usualmente, se observa un color café uniforme en las mejillas, en la frente, en la nariz y en el labio superior y, con mucha frecuencia, es simétrico (igual en ambos lados de la cara).

</think>

Un color marrón uniforme se ve generalmente en las mejillas, frente, nariz o labio superior. Es usual que sea simétrico (igual en ambos lados de la cara).<｜end▁of▁sentence｜

original_english: Your doctor may do other tests to check high blood pressure, heart disease, diabetes, high cholesterol, and other causes of, and risk factors for TIAs or stroke.

</think>

original_english: Stridor is an abnormal, high-pitched, musical breathing sound caused by a blockage in the throat or voice box (larynx).It is usually heard when taking in a breath.

</think>

original_english: If you have surgery, your sperm count will likely increase but it will not improve your chances of getting a woman pregnant.

</think>

original_english: Protein can also be used by the body for energy, but only after glycogen or carbohydrate stores have been used up.

</think>

original_english: Your kidneys help control your body's acid level by removing acid from the blood and sending it into your urine.Acidic substances in the body are counteracted by alkaline substances, primarily bicarbonate.
original_spanish: Los riñones ayudan a controlar el nivel de ácido en el cuerpo, removiendo el ácido de la sangre y eliminándolo en la orina. Las sustancias ácidas en el cuerpo se neutralizan por medio de sustancias alcalinas, principalmente bicarbonato.
translated_spanish:
</think>

Sus riñones ayudan a controlar el nivel ácido de su cuerpo eliminando ácido de la sangre y enviándolo a su orina. Las sustancias ácidas del cuerpo se contrarrestan con sustancias alcalinas, principalmente con el bicarbonato.<｜end▁of▁sentence｜

original_english: You'll likely be diagnosed with rheumatic fever if you meet two major criteria, or one major and two minor criteria, and have signs that you've had a previous strep infection.
original_spanish: El diagnóstico de fiebre reumática se da si uno satisface dos criterios principales, o uno principal y dos secundarios, al igual que si muestra signos de que ha tenido una infección previa por estreptococos.
translated_spanish:
</think>

Si cumplen con dos criterios mayores, o uno mayor y dos menores, y tienen indicios de que han tenido una infección por streptococcus anteriormente, es probable que se les diagnose con fiebre reumática.<｜end▁of▁sentence｜

original_english: A trained physician, often a cardiologist, inserts a small needle into the chest between the ribs and into the thin sac that surrounds the heart (the pericardium).A small amount of fluid is taken out.
original_spanish: Un médico entrenado, con frecuencia un cardiólogo, introducirá una aguja pequeña en el tórax, entre las costillas, hasta el saco delgado que rodea el corazón (el pericardio) y extraerá una cantidad pequeña de líquido.

</think>

original_english: Increased calcium for a limited period of time does not normally cause side effects.However, receiving higher amounts of calcium over a long period of time raises the risk of kidney stones in some people.
original_spanish: Normalmente, el incremento del consumo de calcio durante un período de tiempo limitado no ocasiona efectos secundarios; sin embargo, el hecho de recibir una gran cantidad de calcio durante un período de tiempo prolongado eleva el riesgo de cálculos renales en algunas personas.
translated_spanish:

                    ### Response:
                    El aumento de la calcio por un período de tiempo limitado no causa normalmente efectos secun

original_english: Children with early sexual development are more likely to have psychological and social problems.Children and adolescents generally want to be the same as their peers, and early sexual development can make them appear different.

original_english: These symptoms are more likely to occur if the skin has been cut or rubbed because this gives the MRSA germ a way to “get in.” Symptoms are also more likely in areas where there is more body hair due to hair follicles.

original_english: Advance care directives allow patients to provide instructions about their preferences regarding the care they would like to receive if they develop an illness or a life-threatening injury and are unable to express their preferences.

original_english: Transposition of the great vessels is a heart defect that occurs from birth (congenital). The two major vessels that carry blood away from the heart -- the aorta and the pulmonary artery -- are switched (transposed).

original_english: Another myth of adolescence is the idea that "it will never happen to me, only the other person." original_english: It is important to have the teeth cleaned thoroughly.This may involve use of various tools to loosen and remove plaque and tartar from the teeth. Proper flossing and brushing is always needed, even after professional tooth cleaning, to reduce your risk of gum disease. Your dentist or hygienist will show you how to brush and floss properly.

original_english: Bili lights is a type of light therapy (phototherapy) that is used to treat newborn jaundice . Jaundice is a yellow coloring of the skin and eyes caused by too much of a substance called bilirubin.
